about_the_game:
The Greatest Pleasure DLC unlocks additional static (non-animated) illustrations (CGs) at the end of your waifu's romance path. Once unlocked, the Greatest Pleasure CGs can be viewed at the Gallery. The CGs are ecchi in nature (depictions of sexual act), but it doesn't contain nudity.

This was originally a mod back when the game was first released in 2019, until Steam asked us to convert it into a DLC instead.

❗️❗️❗️ IMPORTANT: Our benevolent overlord and patron Teofilo has created a better version of the Greatest Pleasure DLC (with story and animated CGs). The mod is called 'Hip to be Squire' and you can install it through the game's workshop.
